name: Ambient Noise
summary: Relax or concentrate by playing an ambient background track
description:
Helps you relax or concentrate by creating an ambient background sound track allowing you to focus on your productivity. It features a minimal player, that can be integrated into the Sound Indicator, where you can choose one of the following sound tracks; Coffee Shop, Fire, Forest, Night, Rain, Sea, Storm and Wind.
  • Note: Ambient Noise works best with Indicators enabled via MATE Tweak.
